title: Conair Waterfall Foot Spa with Lights, Bubbles, and Heat
description: Feel tranquil and relaxed, with the new waterfall foot bath from Conair! The full bubble action soothes your soles, while our innovative waterfall massages the tops of your feet as it pampers your toes. Pumice stone, brush and soft-touch massage attachments add touch of luxury; three toe-touch controls make operation easy. Nothing feels better after a long hard day than a foot massage!

title: Marc Anthony Instantly Thick Hair Thickening Cream, 6 oz
description: Get Fuller Hair in an InstantFuller hair is definitely a great advantage as it lets you sport those great looking hairstyles. Marc Anthony True Professional Instantly Thick, Hair Thickening Cream is that special product designed to add volume to your hair making you feel confident.Perfected by World Champion Hair Stylist, Marc AnthonyGives you voluminous hairSoft to touchThis product can completely transform thin hair into fuller hair that is bouncing with volume. It strengthens each strand preventing it from breaking.Just for you:For hair that needs volumeA Closer Look:Marc Anthony True Professional Instantly Thick, Hair Thickening Cream is fortified with a custom blend of hydrolyzed corn, wheat and soy proteins called phytokeratin. This helps strengthen each hair strand while adding intense shine and instant lift for voluminous hair.You Won't Find:Doesn't contain alcohol and is not tested on animals.Get Started:Apply from root to end on damp hair and add heat by blow-drying to maximize fullness.

title: Medicool Manicure Pedicure Station
description: The Manicure - Pedicure Station was designed for general maintenance of natural nails, artificial nails and pedicures.

title: Sexy Hair Big Sexy Hair Powder Play Volumizing and Texturizing Powder, 0.53 Ounce
description: Big sexy hair powder play volumizing and texturizing powder powers up the volume in every hair type with no product feel! Its weightless, odorless and colorless on hair.
